abstract: Citigroup isn’t at a disadvantage when it comes to paying employees, the bank’s chief financial officer said on Thursday.
snippet: Citigroup isn’t at a disadvantage when it comes to paying employees, the bank’s chief financial officer said on Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup isn’t at a disadvantage when it comes to paying employees, the bank’s chief financial officer, John Gerspach, said on Thursday, according to Reuters.

headline.main: Citi Still Has Competitive Pay, C.F.O. Says
